newsitem.title: FRANCE: French official to attend Malian inauguration.
newsitem.headline: French official to attend Malian inauguration.

text.p: France's new junior minister for cooperation Charles Josselin was flying to Mali on Saturday to attend the inauguration of newly re-elected President Alpha Oumar Konare, the French Foreign Ministry said on Saturday.

Josselin was bringing a message of congratulations from Prime Minister Lionel Jospin, who took power this week after a leftist alliance swept the centre-right from power in last Sunday's French parliamentary election, the spokesman said.
Konare was re-elected in a May 11 election.
